Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 18th overall pick, by Ashburn in 1975...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1979, off Victor Lozano (LP)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/18/1979, off Brian Dalley (PEN)...
Injured on 5/16/1981 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Halifax on 2/2/1985 to a 2-year deal worth $537,600 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Coney Island on 2/19/1987 to a 2-year deal worth $1,750,000 per year...
Injured on 9/14/1987 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Pontiac on 3/1/1989 to a minor league contract.
